# PR checklist

Links:
- Handover: /HANDOVER_PROMPT.md
- Rules: docs/ops/01_RULES.md

## Required
- [ ] I followed docs/ops/01_RULES.md
- [ ] VERSION bumped (+1) for product changes (skip if docs-only)
- [ ] DEV smoke is warn-only (does not fail deploy)
- [ ] Acceptance commands included (curl + expected)
- [ ] Links to Actions run attached
